website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality mirror offers users a compact product with  long-lasting LED lighting.
pros: Compact mirror features a glossy black finish
LED light simulates natural light and can last up to 20,000 hours
Five-inch design offers plenty of viewing space
cons: Light is a little too bright for some

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror for Cheer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She is a competitive Cheerleader. They wear A Lot of make up so that the judges can see them from the Judge's stand. I have held a mirror on my knee for her to get ready in the hallways of sport arenas. This mirror with lights has been great for her! She loves it! It takes four #2032 round batteries that are Included. Be sure to turn it it off since it stays on until you slide the switch,. Picture is previous method holding small unlit mirror. Do not buy if you want your daughter to continue to completely depend on you to help her get ready!
customer_reviews.author: CaptDave

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for travel
customer_reviews.text: NIce mirror. I purchased it for an upcoming trip as I’ll be sharing a room with another woman. This will allow me to put on my makeup without hogging the bathroom. It’s a good compromise between size and function. Not too big or heavy but large enough to be useful. Though this doesn’t have a pedestal, I think I’ll be able to prop it up or hold it while putting on eye makeup. The lighted feature is helpful. I’ll update more after the trip.
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, larger than typical compact mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I had this lighted 10x magnifying travel mirror in my saved cart for several weeks before I treated myself. It met my expectations with one exception having to do with its design, which I failed to notice until it was delivered: the mirror is lighted on the side that is not magnified. Since I was buying it specifically for the lighted magnifying side, this was disappointing. If your use will primarily be the regular mirror, then you will love it. Customer service for this product is excellent. I received a follow up email to ensure I was happy with the product, and had a great exchange with one of the company’s owners. That takes it over the top!
customer_reviews.author: River Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea.  Bright light and batteries included.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these as gifts. I opened one of the very nice boxes to see how it looked and worked. It was stunning. The case is really well made and polished to perfection, the mirrors clear and the light very bright. The light could be used as a flashlight in a pinch. It will make a very nice and treasured gift. I didn't know that batteries were included and was pleasantly surprised when the light when on when I pushed the on switch on the bottom of the case.
customer_reviews.author: ozzie t.

customer_reviews.title: Love the LED Lights
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these now, because I stole my daughter's and had to replace hers. This is a nice sized mirror and the LED lights are a great feature. I use this mirror every morning for putting on mascara and I like that I can see any mistakes. I wish it were a bit flatter, so it would sit on a counter flat, but overall, that's just a minor thing. The mirror is small enough to fit into a medium-sized make-up bag, but big enough to be practical.
customer_reviews.author: Alix H

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, but flawed design
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the unit seems excellent. But I think the base design is severely flawed by the choice to have the LED rim light encircling the 1X mirror instead of the 10X. The place where full and even illumination is needed is on the magnified area, not the normal-sized one. Said design flaw makes it useless for my purpose. I ordered a different product which ONLY has the 10X mirror, which is illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Warthog

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light, great size for travel.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and fits easily into her carrying case. We're going on safari where we won't have electricity in our lodging, so the battery operation is important. Not sure why my wife needs to apply makeup on safari, but happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the mirror for a while but did not use much because I have a at home mirror.. Getting ready to go on a trip. Got the mirror out and the batteries are dead. Went to change the batteries and there are the 4 disk batteries. I would not have bought if I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: Hersey

customer_reviews.title: A little large and heavy but otherwise fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is a delightful mirror, however much larger than I'm comfortable to put in my handbag. But the light is bright, however only around the regular mirror not the magnified side, if that matters to you. It's a little hard to open, but other than that it's made well, batteries come installed and is attractive. I bought it for my purse, but because it's so large and heavy, I decided to use it at home or in my cosmetic bag when I travel. Customer service is very good. Highly recommend if a large travel mirror is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mysti A. Hearold

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: It's made very nicely. I do like the light very much, but kinda wish it was on the magnified side, which would make it easier to see close up. The light is only on the NON magnified side, and it will reflect onto the magnified side, but not enough for me to see well enugh. The size is about 5" and is a little big to hold in my hand comfortably. But over all a very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy F.

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me a big 2 sided lighted mirror for Christmas and I have gotten spoiled with it. I had a business trip and went into panic mode because I wasn't going to risk flying with my big mirror so I found this one. Its a good mirror with the only drawback being that it isn't lighted on both sides which as most know is a big plus. That would be my only complaint with it. Other than that it's super handy and travels great!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Would be the perfect mirror EXCEPT lighted side is NOT the magnification side. I need lighting on that side. Other than that it's perfect mirror-good size for traveling and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Compact but not tiny
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read the description thoroughly and thought it would be more compact but it is the size of your palm. But it will still fit in a large purse or travel bag so you have a close up mirror for makeup and tweezing. Mirror feels very heavy duty and good quality. Bought as a gift for my sister and best friend! I may have to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Only lighted on full reflection
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself is great. My only complaint is that it is only lighted on full reflection and therefore casts a shadow when using 10x magnification. I bought this specifically for the magnification when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: goodgolly

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet, as described!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a big help! Perfect suze, light weight, very bright LED, and the 10x is showing way tooo many wrinkles lol! Good deal for the $, great stocking styffer!! UPDATE, after using for a few weeks I'm kinda disappointed..a little tricky to open, just nothing to grab, and if carrying it the light turnes on all the time by itself...i still like it but I might look for something else
customer_reviews.author: WendyCee's

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I expected and won't fit in my purse. It's super magnified, so be ready. Also, I can only focus if I use one eye, which is ok because I bought it mainly to be able to see when there's something in my eye (since my close up vision stinks). The light is perfect and easy to operate. Seems sturdy. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: E. Radcliff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the best travel mirror I've ever used! I'm actually kind of glad I broke my last one so I could discover this beauty. It travels very well and I found it to be fairly durable. It's the perfect size to be a proper, functional mirror if the place your staying has bad lighting and/or no available mirrors and the lights are nice and bright. I wish it was a tiny bit thinner but that's a minor qualm. If you're looking for a mirror that travels well and is easy to use, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: La Ha

customer_reviews.title: Too Dim!
customer_reviews.text: The light seems to be on the wrong side and doesn’t illuminate the mirror enough! I don’t find it helps at all. Was frustrating to use and not able to see any better as I had hoped. Might as well look into a regular mirror as I find it is better than using this. Disappointed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Delia

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a travel size light up mirror and my goodness was this one BEAUTIFUL. I have to admit, I SUCK at looking at item measurements so when I received this mirror it was bigger than expected which is what made it all the more better. It’s bigger than your regular compact mirror but still small enough to be able to travel with. I recommend my mirror to all my make up lovers! I’m so happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea torres

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but the light stopped working after 1 week. Also worth mentioning, the light is only effective for the regular mirror but does not brighten up the magnifying mirror which would be nice. Definitely not worth $25. It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Michigan customer

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: I use this for plucking facial hair. I really wish the lighted area was on the side thats magnified but its not. It is okay for my needs with plucking. Overall i am unhappy with the fact that you need the silver disk type batteries! What a let down! I have to special order batteries? Also its only mid june, i bought this a month ago and already need to replace the batteries!! Ill be ordering something better, this aint it:(
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hettig

customer_reviews.title: I love the light around the 1x
customer_reviews.text: The 5" is a bit big for my hand, but I'm sure in time I will adapt. I love the light around the 1x! Trying to open compact is pretty tight when trying with thumb nail. I hope in time and wear it will loosen up and be easier! Overall I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Seriously bright
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a little on the heavy side compared to my old LED version. It is bright and shows every detail whether you want to see it or not. It takes a little getting used to because the lighted side reflects off the magnified mirror but not hard to adjust to this feature. The mirror is worth the money so far, I have had it a few weeks and used it 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Chimes

customer_reviews.title: Wished light would work, great size for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have put batteries in this twice and they just die so quickly. I thought maybe I had gotten bad batteries the first time but put new again right before leaving for a trip and by the first time I needed to use it, they didn’t work again and it was NOT turned on. I checked immediately,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I have a habit of touching up my makeup and lipstick throughout the day. It’s a habit I don’t plan to give up any time soon. This mirror supports my habit perfectly. I love the size and the light is amazing! I brought my mom one for her birthday. She loves it as well!
customer_reviews.author: LouLou1355

customer_reviews.title: Great travel mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was not a disappointment for what it is. I am thoroughly spoiled with having to have a lighted/magnified mirror to apply certain aspects of makeup, and was concerned how I was going to handle it on a trip to Alaska. This will be perfect. The magnification is certainly adequate. I can even see things I didn't in my really big mirror (Yikes). Obviously, it will pack well. The only challenge will be to position it at a level where I don't have to hold it while applying makeup. Some of you gals may be able to put on eyeliner with one hand? I'm relieved to have this as a travel option!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly K Hallett

customer_reviews.title: I like the large mirror size and the lighted side is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a handy (pretty much fits in the palm of your hand), large travel mirror. I like the large mirror size and the lighted side is excellent. It shows your face in "real" light. Also, if you're travelling and sharing a bathroom, this mirror is perfect for putting on makeup outside the bathroom and to also make sure that you're putting on the right amount of make-up (the light is very good).. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Light--great things do come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: I like this item for it being so compact and able to my once larger mirror. Of course, I am aware that this item utilizes batteries, so I had to order batteries for the future. The item did come with batteries though---so, all-in-all, great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but not tiny. Big enough to be able to do your makeup away from a big mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small mirror for those times when the bathroom was occupied and then I need to do my makeup in a different location. This one fits the bill it is small and fits right in my zip up makeup case. I was surprised how much I liked the light and the brightness for doing things like plucking eyebrows or putting eyeliner on.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: If I could have gotten it with even stronger magnification I would have. Perfect for putting on makeup, tweezing eyebrows, etc. when you're traveling and don't have access to the makeup mirror installed in your bathroom. The LED light is helpful for when natural or strong light is not available. I ordered it as a travel mirror and it meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Marlamay13

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnification
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Fancii LED travel mirror for a gift. I had previously purchased one for myself and just love it. The magnification side of this mirror is my favorite part. Makes plucking eyebrows so easy! I love that it is a compact size for travel. I always keep it in my travel toiletry bag so I won’t forget it. Best mirror ever!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Z.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has both a 10x and a 1x magnification mirror and that the 10x doesn't get blurry. I would recommend it being a little bit lighter weight and smaller and that the light be on the 10x side (that is the side one would use to really examine one's face). To make it perfect, I would recommend a kick stand like feature that would enable the mirror to be on the counter but raised up so one doesn't have to bend down uncomfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Bethesda

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible. I bought it for travel. I used it once and the batteries died the next time I opened the mirror. It will cost more to buy batteries than the product coat. Now to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaryn L Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I needed a mirror that was portable but still had the 10x magnification. The added LED lighting makes it easier to determine how much makeup.
customer_reviews.author: NKB

customer_reviews.title: A great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for my significant other as an essential to her skincare routine when she travels. All of the dimensions were correct and the product was delivered properly. For the price point, this travel mirror is affordable and durable. I love that she can have a mini setup with this product so it also definitely delivers on it's purpose. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Best compact ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, especially the size of of the compact and each mirror and the X10 magnification on one side. I also like that it lights on one side only. If you open the compact to a 90% angle, it lights the magnified side perfectly. As someone who easily gets migraines from bright light, this is the perfect compact. And it’s lightweight—it will definitely go with me on my next trip. Bonus—the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Naj

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is light weight enough to easily fit in a purse or suitcase, but large enough to be useful. However, I've only given it 3 stars because only the regular mirror is lighted, not the magnified side.
customer_reviews.author: psycho

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The 10x magnification is little bit excessive for me since i wanted to use it to do my eye make up. The light thing is bright but it's not really effective to me. Its too blinding so I haven't really used it much. Maybe it works better in the dark but I would never put my makeup on in the dark. Honestly, I would have returned it but I just kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Chariel

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for travel. Tired of trying to put on makeup with little to no light in hotel baths and/or rooms. It is compact but more than adequate for the job. Easy to hold or place on table or desk. Grest clarity. May replace my current stand mirror at home!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror—I’ve been looking for years for a travel mirror that’s not too bulky and doesn’t take up valuable packing space. My search is over—this is IT! It’s just the right size for makeup application. Only thing I’d change would be to make the magnification 15x instead of 10x.
customer_reviews.author: NRV

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large lighted stand mirror for my vanity, but needed a small one for travel. Didn't really expect much, but thought it would be better than nothing since the lighting in most hotel bathrooms are not that great. OMG!!! This has taken the place of my large mirror and I use it every day. It is so compact and I'm able to store away easily and hold it close to my face to see all of those small eyebrows that I was not seeing with my larger mirror. I cannot say enough good things about this product. Great Value and Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good size, hard to open, only lit on one side
customer_reviews.text: I like the nice, compact size of this item. The light and magnification are sufficient. There are actually two separate mirrors once it's open. One is regular and the other is magnified. Only the regular side has lighting. I mainly needed it on the magnified side. I guess for the price, I expected light on both sides. Also, it's hard to open the compact without damaging a fingernail.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kinsolving

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Travels well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel mirror. There are still some hotels that do not provide magnification mirrors. For older travelers this handy mirror allows use to apply makeup without glasses and to check the back of our hair to ensure everything is covered and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. It is big enough without being too big. Can fit easily in my purse as well as in my hand. Need the magnifier to make sure make up is on right and this fits he bill. I am buying a second one for my nightstand they are so handy. Love this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Poppinfresh

customer_reviews.title: Equally good products out there for less $$
customer_reviews.text: After my item arrived and I tested it and tossed the packaging, I found an equally good one for much less in cost. Bummer. Still a good product, but it would be great if the 10x magnification side had a light
customer_reviews.author: Shelley's review

customer_reviews.title: The light is bright and comes on with an easy to handle switch
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality materials. The light is bright and comes on with an easy to handle switch. Light is LED with built in battery. Its thin and compact. The only problem is the 10X magnification is almost too much.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy, useful, compact product with customer support if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Really great magnification. Light great too, without heat or glare. Great communication from sell. Great to open and it is ready to go. Seller cares and communicates in follow up to make sure all well and working. It is a great travel and purse size, very flat. I wish there were one twice the size just to keep at the ready and handy. Will search for one. Have low vision and this works great for that! Highly recommend, especially for compromised vision.
customer_reviews.author: Jean D.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use!! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this mirror and I thought perfect!! I’ve been traveling lately and find most bathrooms and dressing area have awful lighting to apply makeup! This mirror is great to take with you everywhere. The light is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Back of mirror that holds the batteries in broke so fast. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: ilia k.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it ... but
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the mirror, especially its size, when it comes to traveling. She wishes it were a bit larger for everyday use. That's easily solved-we buy another mirror for her vanity.
customer_reviews.author: R2

customer_reviews.title: Wrong side has the Light . . .
customer_reviews.text: Needs improvement. Hard to use 10x without a light. The light is on other 1x side. D a r n !
customer_reviews.author: Florida-Gail

customer_reviews.title: FInally!  The travel mirror in your dreams.
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled for the past 40 years and must have bought at least ten to fifteen “Travel mirrors “. Each one seemed great at first glance but over time each one showed a deficiency - too small, light too dim, case broke with too much travel/ supposedly it’s sole purpose!!! This mirror is not too small and not to big.It had.a sturdy case in a beautiful shinny black. On short- every detail perfect!
customer_reviews.author: E Perry Good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Travel Mirror, Good clear magnifying mirror and well lighted. Big enough to see your face and small compact to travel.
customer_reviews.author: HHM

customer_reviews.title: Great workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described. The quality appeared to be as expected. It was a gift for my mother in-law. Although she wanted a smaller size, I believe the led lights sold her. She is getting older and her eyes are not as good as hey used to be, so having a larger viewing area and lights was great. At this point, I will give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Piedra

customer_reviews.title: A very versatile, high-quality mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I carry this mirror in my purse and it’s great for travel. The light is nice and bright, and it’s very well-made. I sit on my bed and tweeze my eyebrows with it.
customer_reviews.author: £orelei C.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror, the light works really well the communication from the company was excellent. I’m using it to pluck my eyebrows and put on my make up. Works perfectly! I ordered the black and it’s very chic.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Everything I could want!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT travel mirror!!! The mirror is bright, the magnification is perfect for plucking those pesky hairs, it’s compact enough to throw and go! Absolutely everything I want in my travel makeup mirror!
customer_reviews.author: JLBchamb

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is bigger than I thought, bought it for my girl friend to have and it's bigger than most hand sized mirrors and she usually has a small purse so she wasn't super happy with the size. Other than that it's a great mirror, she loves the light and with the size that it is. The mirror actually good for viewing. Definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mirror. Excellent business to do business with as well. The first mirror I received was defective. They were quick to send me a replacement and I love it. However, understand that this compact looking mirror is quite large. Definitely bigger than the palm of my hand but I'm glad. It works for me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Just absolutely fabulous! The 2 mirrors work just like they're supposed to. One regular magnification in 110 times the magnification. The light that's on it is really pretty bright and comes in quite handy.
customer_reviews.author: Karl  Barry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Light is the real deal. Really, really bright (the white kind, not yellow) the size is not too big but not too small, it's perfect to use during a flight or applying make up, etc. The 10x mirror has minimum distortion. Perfect price and quality. Doesn't look cheap. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Tello

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and perfect for traveling. The only downside is that TSA marks it for inspection everytime it was in my carry-on. I only check it now.
customer_reviews.author: John Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors are very clear.
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors are clear. The light could be brighter, but it is fine. It is a little heavier than I thought it would be, but that means that it is not fragile. Will be great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: JHAN

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead in days
customer_reviews.text: Lighted side is not magnified side of mirror and the battery died after couple of uses. Is the battery replaceable or is it just to be put in the landfill now?
customer_reviews.author: kimb

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mid sized travel mirror. My only concern is the convenience of getting more batteries as I checked on-line at amazon and there were non available.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Yates

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Just had cataract surgery, which sacrificed my near vision, so putting on eye makeup now is a challenge! Wanted something for my travel bag. Hotel bathrooms so often lack good lighting so this will work great. Seems like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: justfitz

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect gift for my 17 and 18 year old grand ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my 17 and 18 year old grand daughters. Though loved it for the size of a lighted mirror that they can throw in their purse. Both are fairly new to wearing make up (less than a year) and have struggled with applying eyelashes. With the lighted magnifying mirror, this made process is easier and much better results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: You can see everything! I wish there were lights around both mirrors. But this is perfect for on the go or grooming eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this! Just Buy it! Good gift ideas!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for all things! I don’t think I need to explain. Just.. you need this! —- I’m not one to write reviews, good or bad. So the fact that I am writing one, this tells you something. I would buy this for a lot of family members great for gifts. Just BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE ILLUMINATED AND MAGNIFIED MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: So practical when traveling. Love the lighted and magnified mirror. It's big enough to actually be functional. Other smaller mirrors are fine if you only want to see one eye at a time. :)
customer_reviews.author: T. E. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It’s perece BUT!! Don’t leave it on :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror, it was perfect for my camping trip. Accidentally left it on for several days and I can’t tell what size these round batteries are? Can someone tell me what size the battery is on this mirror?
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Perez

customer_reviews.title: Terrific mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror light is bright! I can see to pluck my eyebrows in the magnifying side. I can also check my makeup is on smoothly before I head out each day. It is flat and will carry nicely in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Dee M

customer_reviews.title: the light is on the wrong side!
customer_reviews.text: This travel mirror is a great size, but the lighted part is on the unmagnified side, which makes it difficult to use as a make up mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Margery B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for weekend travel
customer_reviews.text: Compact and perfect size for weekend travel. The LED lighting is great when applying make up. I teccomend this mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is lightweight and has a good amplifier. There is a sweet spot where your face needs to be an exact distance away otherwise it is blurry, but it isn't hard to find. I wouldn't say the light is bright, it doesn't add a significant amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: lighting could be better but best product I have found for this purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The light is not on the magnified side which is what I need. I have adapted and this is the best product for its purpose that I have found so far and I have tried several.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Heim

customer_reviews.title: Quality mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Large. Good light. 10x is scary, but useful. Mirror quality is good. Overall quality is also good. Not a feather, but you don't want flimsy, do you?

customer_reviews.title: Great little mirror

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, but a keeper

customer_reviews.author: RT(R)

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this mirror is small enough to be considered travel size, yet it is big enough to do your make up in! The light is a total bonus. Great price, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Nice reflection.
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. Light is bright, which is sometimes needed with hotel lighting. For packing purposes, the size is excellent, but large enough for easy viewing when using. Great product!!!

customer_reviews.author: OneEyeReader

customer_reviews.title: Great, just very very very large.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster. I like it, I just wish it was normal compact size. It's much larger than my hand... a compact for a giant! Other than that, I like that the top stays put where you set it - the hinge is nice and tight. And the lighting is a cool feature, I personally just dislike the blue-tone typical LED lighting, I wish it had a warmer light.
customer_reviews.author: ginny

customer_reviews.title: great compact mirror
customer_reviews.text: Like the magnification. Follow instructions on how far away to hold so it is not blurry. I wish the light was on the magnified side.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be a nice quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a nice quality mirror. I think it will be Good for travel; it’s NOT a tiny compact make up mirror. It is roughly slightly larger than my palm. The lights are on one side, which works fine for me. I haven’t traveled with it yet. As far as I’m concerned this was a great purchase. If it proves otherwise during my travels then I’ll amend my review.
customer_reviews.author: Bloomreader3

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic; however, it isn’t a compact-sized ‘compact’ mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the mirror excepted the fact it isn’t very compact. it’s quite a large (5” in diameter) mirror and doesn’t fit inside my purse!

customer_reviews.title: Low light batteries don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a disappointment. It does not light up very bright and it goes through batteries quickly. Uses 4 round lithium batteries. I would not by again.
customer_reviews.author: Chillee

customer_reviews.title: Compact & lighted for travel
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror because it's compact for traveling. I like the fact that's it lighted. The magnification is a little strong requiring you to get your face pretty close to the mirror for clarity. But overall, I think I will enjoy it's convenience! Elaine

customer_reviews.title: This is a dream.
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream. If you hold up to your face, one side lights it up well and the other side seriously magnifies. Actually both sides magnify. I can see every pore on my face. I wish I’d bought this a long time ago.
